posts.post_content: If you have enough mana to make this guy suitably big enough, then maybe you have enough mana to make him just a *little bit* bigger with a bit of help from a certain [Skarrg Goliath](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Skarrg Goliath). It's a little bit over the top, but hey, this is Gruul, so, you know, **KILL BIGGER! CRUSH FASTER! WE EAT!**

posts.post_content: Savageborn Hydra is a great card for standard! An average deck would play him at earliest most likely at turn 4, so 2/2 with double strike. Turn 5 is great, but turn 6 is amazing for 4/4 double strike. Then he can boost himself. No protection though, he is a all out swinger; plus the art is one of the best in dragon's maze. 4/5.
